description: The file defines the root layout component for a Remix-based React application. It sets up document structure, imports global styles, and specifies external font links. Also, it exports functions for links and layout, and defines the main App component rendering an Outlet.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external links such as stylesheets and font preconnects for the document.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: A React component that sets up the HTML document structure including head elements and body content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: A React component that renders the outlet for nested routes.
